DOC.brief_summary: This study double-blind randomize , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , 12 week study perform 5 centre Sweden ass effect Omega-3 carboxylic acid dapagliflozin liver fat patient Type 2 diabetes fatty liver ( > 5.5 % measure magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) )
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Effects Omega-3 Carboxylic Acids Dapagliflozin Liver Fat Content Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent prior study specific procedure ; Men woman ≥40 year ≤75 year suitable vein cannulation repeat venepuncture ; Have liver fat content assess MRI > 5.5 % ; Diagnosis Type 2 diabetes since least 6 month accordance WHO criterion . Any condition MRI contraindicate , limited , pacemaker claustrophobia ; Diagnosis sign Type 1 diabetes ( e.g . history positive islet antibody ) ; Creatinine clearance < 60 mL/min screening ( CockcroftGault formula ) .
